item.title: The More You Know
item.author: Marcko
item.description: Wikis/Megathreads/Awesome Github Repos Awesome Github Awesome - Awesome lists about all kinds of interesting topics. Find most of the “Awesome” Github repos here. Awesome Awesomeness - A curated list of awesome awesomeness. Similar to what’s above. Awesome Research - A curated list of tools to help you with your research/life. Awesome Python - A curated list of awesome Python frameworks, libraries, software and resources. Awesome Piracy - A curated list of awesome warez and piracy links.
